title: France panorama. [No. 72/18]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Underground telephone exchange based at the Tulleries gardens. 2. 1972 Electronic components show. 3. French Olympic judo team at winter quarters in Fontainebleau. 4. The Dominican Abbey in Toulouse after its restoration. 5. Tapestries designed by the sculptor Alexander Calder. 6. The 1972 Contemporary Arts Festival at Royan.
